name: Bravo Angel Strategies
goal: Bravo Strategies is a professional and transdisciplinary consultancy at the interphase between science and society, driven by advancing science and innovation as solutions to major societal needs – and with a focus on sustainability. A dedicated lobbyist firm whose founder has a proven track record of advocating industry’s voice in complex discussions with stakeholders, in a credible and ethical manner.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
F Gas Regulation
Climate Neutral Economy
RED II
Circular Economy
Bioeconomy
EU Strategy for Plastics
Horizon 2020/Horizon Europe
